description: President Obama answered a question from Mark Landler, a White House Correspondent for The New York Times, about the ongoing crisis in Syria and about putting pressure on the Assad regime.
title: President Obama Speaks on Syria
title_page: President Obama Speaks on Syria - Video - NYTimes.com
text: President Obama answered a question from Mark Landler, a White House Correspondent for The New York Times, about the ongoing crisis in Syria and about putting pressure on the Assad regime.
